languages.text: Вольный Торговец сделал{mf||а} Лекс Империалис столпом веры на Даргонусе. Дисциплина и послушание стали самыми чтимыми добродетелями среди паствы.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец сделал{mf||а} Лекс Империалис столпом веры на Даргонусе. Дисциплина и послушание стали самыми чтимыми добродетелями среди паствы.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец сделал{mf||а} Лекс Империалис столпом веры на Даргонусе. Дисциплина и послушание стали самыми чтимыми добродетелями среди паствы.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.
The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.

The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.
The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Lex İmperialis'i Dargonus'ta bir inanç dayanağı yaptı. Disiplin ve itaat, halkın gözünde en büyük erdemlere dönüştü.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, Lex İmperialis'i Dargonus'ta bir inanç dayanağı yaptı. Disiplin ve itaat, halkın gözünde en büyük erdemlere dönüştü.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a fait de la Lex Imperialis un pilier de la foi sur Dargonus. La discipline et l'obéissance sont devenues les plus grandes vertus de la congrégation.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a fait de la Lex Imperialis un pilier de la foi sur Dargonus. La discipline et l'obéissance sont devenues les plus grandes vertus de la congrégation.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーはダルゴナスで、レックス・インペリアを信仰の柱へと変えた。規律と服従は、信徒たちのあいだで最高の美徳となった。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーはダルゴナスで、レックス・インペリアを信仰の柱へと変えた。規律と服従は、信徒たちのあいだで最高の美徳となった。

languages.text: 行商浪人将《帝国法典》变成了达戈努斯的信仰支柱。在所有信徒心中，纪律与服从便是最崇高的美德。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人将《帝国法典》变成了达戈努斯的信仰支柱。在所有信徒心中，纪律与服从便是最崇高的美德。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente convirtió la Lex Imperialis en un pilar de la fe de Dargonus. La disciplina y la obediencia son las mayores virtudes para la congregación.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente convirtió la Lex Imperialis en un pilar de la fe de Dargonus. La disciplina y la obediencia son las mayores virtudes para la congregación.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat das Lex Imperia auf Dargonus in eine Säule des Glaubens verwandelt. Disziplin und Gehorsam sind nun die größten Tugenden der Kongregation.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader turned the Lex Imperialis into a pillar of faith on Dargonus. Discipline and obedience have become the greatest virtues among the congregation.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat das Lex Imperia auf Dargonus in eine Säule des Glaubens verwandelt. Disziplin und Gehorsam sind nun die größten Tugenden der Kongregation.
